meanings.sent1: She always acts biggity around others, thinking she is better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: The biggity cat strutted around the neighborhood as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent3: The biggity squirrel refused to share its nuts with the other animals in the park.
meanings.sent4: His biggity attitude was like a shiny crown he wore for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The biggity peacock flaunted its colorful feathers, demanding attention from all.

meanings.sent1: With a biggity smile, she jumped off the high diving board into the pool.
meanings.sent2: The biggity explorer ventured into the unknown jungle without fear.
meanings.sent3: The biggity chef decided to experiment with unusual ingredients in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His biggity decision to challenge the champion surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The biggity firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.sent1: The biggity peacock displayed its vibrant feathers to attract a mate.
meanings.sent2: She felt biggity after winning the competition, strutting around with pride.
meanings.sent3: The biggity car owner revved the engine loudly to draw attention.
meanings.sent4: His biggity behavior at the party annoyed the other guests.
meanings.sent5: The biggity student always raised his hand first, eager to show off his knowledge.
